snippet.title: Making a Metroidvania for the Playdate
snippet.description:
I made a metroidvania game for the Playdate handheld console over the course of 10 days.

Get the game here!: https://squidgod.itch.io/the-kings-dungeon
Patreon supporters get my game early and the source codes for all my games!: https://www.patreon.com/squidgoddev

Join my Discord!: https://discord.gg/kDM8RU4aFt

Ascent by Johan Peitz : https://johanpeitz.itch.io/ascent

Follow me on Twitter to see sneak peeks/updates!: https://twitter.com/SquidGodDev

Music/SFX from Epidemic Sound. Get a 30 day free trial: https://share.epidemicsound.com/njknzw
